entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 19 January 2023
